main.description: A logical collection of processes, with optional connected agreements, that constitute a body of scheduled work with defined deliverable(s).

planIncludes.description: The processes and and non-process commitments/intents that constitute the plan.

hasIndependentDemand.description: The commitments and/or intents which this plan was created to deliver.

due.description: The date, and time if desired, something is expected to be complete.

created.description: The date, and time if desired, the information was agreed to or recorded.

name.description: An informal or formal textual identifier for an object. Does not imply uniqueness.

note.description: Any useful textual information related to the item.
